title: Rainy city street with parked cars and a crosswalk, the ego vehicle is moving slowly and braking frequently.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy day, with parked cars on the side of the road and a crosswalk nearby.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and braking frequently due to the rainy conditions, which can make the road slippery and reduce visibility.
